content.raw: It appears `void Run()` in `sensors/server.cc` and `Server::Run()` calls `gazebo::sensors::run_once(true)`, which calls `senosrs::SensorManager::Instance()->Update(_force)`, which calls `SensorManager::Update(bool force)`, which then calls individual `Update(force)` on all sensors in `SensorManager::sensors`.  By bypassing both the active flag and rate control parameters of sensor update, this appears to make all sensors in simulation update unthrottled?
content.html: It appears void Run() in sensors/server.cc and Server::Run() calls gazebo::sensors::run_once(true), which calls senosrs::SensorManager::Instance()->Update(_force), which calls SensorManager::Update(bool force), which then calls individual Update(force) on all sensors in SensorManager::sensors. By bypassing both the active flag and rate control parameters of sensor update, this appears to make all sensors in simulation update unthrottled?
